name: Car Wash Simulator 2020
description:
Car wash simulator. Start your business by cleaning the cars of incoming customers. To attract new visitors, do your work quickly and efficiently. For best results, perform cleaning in several stages. All these steps should be completed as quickly as possible. Become the best in your business, beating all competitors!

Dynamic gameplay will not let you get bored.
Colorful design and detailed animation will please with its visual component.
A lot of visitors in different cars will not allow you to sit still.

Car Wash Simulator-an unusual simulator in which you will get your own car wash, you will manage and work in the car wash service.The main goal is to earn the most money.

Each level includes a variety of machines. Auto repair has never been such an amazing adventure.
